verbose_text: The activation of cap dependent translation in G1 phase through mTOR mediated phosphorylation of eIF4E-BP and MnK mediated phosphorylation of eIF4E has been well characterized in mammals, but the mechanism for TOR mediated translation initiation and G1/S cell-cycle progression in yeast remains poorly understood.
evidence: mTOR-mediated phosphorylation of eIF4E-BP and MnK-mediated phosphorylation of eIF4E
